TopicTitle: Warp Stopper - Ver. 1.2.0 Stop your warp with a single tap of a bindable button! Updated!

Articles.Content:
Hi! I have created my first plugin! Simple plugin! All the information and license things are all on the Kerbal Stuff page Source is there to.

What it does

Add the ability to stop warp using a bindable key. Very useful for interplanetary warps. Sorry about no screenshots. Its not much of a screenshot mod

Download:

Mod & Source Link

INSTALLATION

Remove all traces of the mod from your gamedata if you have an older version Extract RandomIndustrys into your GameData in the KSP root folder ??? Profit!

TODO

Add a shrinkable menu. Suggestions

Suggestions?

PM me on the forums.

OR

Feel free to PM me on Reddit /u/Real_Some_Random_Guy

Versions

Version 1.2.0: Added 'open this menu' bindable key

Version 1.1.0: Added ability to change key bind.

Version 1.0.0: Mod released. Added the ability to stop Warp using the "z" key.

If you encounter an error

Try to recreate the bug. If the bug occurs again. Try to reinstall Warp Stopper on a fresh version of KSP with NO mods! Just WS. If the issue still persists, Pastebin the logs and send them in a pm to me on the forums.

Thanks to Jetwave and everyone who helped me on the #KSPModders Esper.net Channel! If they didn't exist this mod wouldn't exist!

 

Edited March 3, 2016 by FiresThatBurn
Fixed for SpaceDock and sourcfe update
YES ! I've been waiting for that, thanks ! You might want to change the z key though as I know other mods use it.
Thats planned for the next update

YES ! I've been waiting for that, thanks ! You might want to change the z key though as I know other mods use it.

Came here to say just this.

FloorIt uses Z to go full throttle, but I don't know if that key would even function while in warp. I'll check

(EDIT) Nope, "Z" for FloorIt does nothing while in Warp

Edited August 26, 2014 by Eleven
Checked Conflicting Keys

Does this respond faster than an action group set to do the same thing? I think there's an (extremely annoying) cooldown between actions when I try to make short hops (warp on -> warp off asap). If it gets past that you have my extreme gratitude.
I was about to complain about my personal use of Z for the light toggle, but that's another thing that tends to not function under time warp, so I guess my complaint is mute now.

I believe so. It depends on how fast the game processes it. I guess so. There isnt a cooldown.

- - - Updated - - -

Yeah, people have said Z would cause problems. With floorit. It would in phys timewarp.

I believe so. It depends on how fast the game processes it. I guess so. There isnt a cooldown.

Hey, this is a good little mod.. but regarding the keybind issue, could I make a suggestion?

Is it possible to use the same keybind as the 'cut engines' bind? I've often wished that the cut engines (defaults to 'x') key could also stop warp, since it's generally my panic key anyways... heh.

Ideally it wouldn't replace the cut engines action, but execute alongside it.
It's for Interstellar Quest mod, right?

It's for Interstellar Quest mod, right?

Uhm. I just made this to practice C#

Ideally it wouldn't replace the cut engines action, but execute alongside it.
